loans.use: to buy more stock of hotdogs, sausages and other processed or frozen goods to sell.

loans.name: Gricelda Rocio

texts.es:
Gricelda, de 19 años de edad, es ama de casa, está acompañada, ella estudió hasta 5° grado y su pareja realizó sus estudios hasta 6° grado y él se dedica a la agricultura. 

Gricelda, a abierto una tienda hace 3 meses. 

Ella, solicita el crédito para comprar productos básicos del hogar como (tomate, chiles, cebollas, zanahorias, huisquil y papas) para vender en la tienda.

El sueño de Gricelda, es mejorar el negocio y ampliarlo para que genere más ganancias y tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Gricelda is 19 years old, a housewife. She lives with her partner and has a fifth grade education. Her partner has a six grade education and is a farmer.
Gricelda opened a store or three months ago.

She is requesting the loan to buy basic household products such as tomatoes, chilies, carrots, squashes and potatoes, so that she can sell them in her store. Gricelda's dream is to improve her business and expand it so that she can generate more earnings and have a better quality of life.

loans.use: To buy basic household products such as tomatoes, chilies, carrots, squashes and potatoes, so that she can sell them in her store.

loans.name: Juan

texts.es:
Juan, de 31 años de edad, es agricultor, está acompañado, su compañera de vida vende tortillas dos veces al día, el negocio lo tiene en el local donde alquilan.

Juan, se dedica a la agricultura desde que era pequeño, a medida fue pasando el tiempo, fue tomando experiencia, el depende de su trabajo y de la ganancia que saca de sus cosechas. 

Juan, solicita el crédito para comprar maíz y leña, para la venta de tortillas y para prepararse para la época de invierno. 

El sueño de Juan, es construir su propia casa y tener una mejor forma de vida.
texts.en: Juan is 31 years old. He is a farmer and lives with his life partner. They have a side-business set up in a space they rent, where she sells tortillas twice a day. Juan has been farming ever since he was little. As time went by, he gradually gained experience. He depends on his work and on the profit he makes from harvesting his crops. Juan is requesting this loan to buy corn and firewood to make tortillas and get ready for the winter season. His dream is to build his own house and have a better way of life.

loans.use: to buy corn and firewood.

loans.name: Sara

texts.es:
Sara, de 74 años de edad, estudió hasta sexto grado de educación básica, está casada y tiene tres hijos, de los cuales ninguno de ellos vive en su casa, porque están casados y viven en el extranjero y solo su esposo vive con ella.

Sara, trabaja en la agricultura desde que es muy joven, ya que ella vive en una zona rural la cual es muy fuerte para el trabajo agrícola, ella trabaja de la mano con su esposo, hay personas que les ayudan a sacar los cultivos, ya que cultiva tres hectáreas de maíz.

El crédito lo necesita para pagar la mano de obra que le ayudará a cosechar los granos y así mismo para pagar la molida de los granos.- 

El sueño que ella tiene es, sacar su cosecha para luego venderla y arreglar el techado de su vivienda.
texts.en:
Sara, 74 years old, attended elementary school up until the 6th grade. She is married and has three kids, none of which live at home with her because they are married and live abroad. Only her husband lives with her. 

Sara has worked in agriculture since she was very young, as she lives in a rural area where there is a lot of farming. She works alongside her husband, as well as with people who help them harvest the crops, since they grow three hectares of corn. 

She needs the loan to pay for manual laborers that will help her harvest the grains and thereby pay for them to be milled. 

Her dream is to reap her harvest to later sell and repair the roof of her home.

loans.use: to pay for manual laborers that will help her harvest the grains and pay to have them milled

loans.name: Roberto Carlos

texts.es:
Roberto, de 38 años de edad, estudió hasta quinto grado de educación básica, tiene quince años de estar acompañado y tiene tres hijos, de los cuales todos están estudiando y su pareja se dedica a los oficios domésticos.

Él se dedica a cultivar maíz desde que estaba muy joven, actualmente tiene dos hectáreas de cultivo de maíz, también se dedica a el transporte de personas, esto le genera ingresos adicionales para la alimentación de su familia.

El crédito será invertido para comprar un repuesto del vehículo que utiliza para hacer viajes, ya que se le ha dañado y no puede trabajar sino le hace el cambio de dicho repuesto. 

El sueño que tiene Roberto es, poder reparar su vehículo para seguir prestando el servicio a su gente, ya que es muy necesario en su comunidad el servicio que él brinda.
texts.en:
Roberto, 38, has a 5th grade education.  He's been married for 15 years, and has 3 children who all attend school.  His partner is a housewife.

Roberto has been cultivating corn since he was very young.  He now has 2 hectares under cultivation, and he also works providing passenger transportation services.  This enables him to generate extra income to feed his family.

Roberto will use this loan to buy a part for the vehicle he uses to make his trips, because the part in his vehicle was damaged, and he hasn't been able to work without replacing this particular part.

Roberto's dream is to repair his vehicle so that he can continue to provide people with transportation services, because his services are needed in his community.

loans.use: to buy a replacement part for his vehicle

loans.name: Bashiran

texts.en:
Bashiran is age 49 and the mother of four children, living with her spouse and children in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. Her husband is a green grocer by profession, and he has been selling fresh vegetables at a shop in a nearby town for many years. Her husband offers seasonal and fresh vegetables to his customers. He has been feeding his family through the generated income from this vegetable shop. 

Nowadays, the needs of Bashiran's family suddenly increased and her husband does not have other sources to cope with these needs. So he decided to expand his current business. He wants to increase his stock on daily basis so that he can maximize sales of the vegetables. So, Bashiran applied for a loan so that her husband would be able to buy more vegetables for selling.

Bashiran is very thankful to Kiva and field partner BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy fresh and seasonal vegetables for her husband's business.

loans.name: Chhoeurn's Group

texts.en: Chhoeurn is 31 years old and a mother of one child. She lives in the Moung Russey district of Battambang province. She earns income to support her family by selling grocery items and she raises pigs to earn extra income. For Chhoeurn, this is her fourth loan from VisionFund (Kiva’s partner) and she has fully repaid her past loans successfully. She leads a group of two for a new loan. As the group leader, Chhoeurn will spend her loan portion to buy pig feed to support her pig-raising business. She hopes that she can get more income to improve her lifestyle.

loans.use: To buy pig feed to support her pig-raising.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to enhance in her husband's small restaurant with crockery and fresh food items.

loans.name: Nhóm 11-Bình Xuyên Group

texts.en: Huong, 45, works in agricultural production and earns a monthly income of approximately VND 710,000. She is married with three children who are still in school. She has been a member of the local Women's Union since 1989. Her husband died so she has to support an old mother. Now, her family is in an economic hardship situation and could not afford to have a hygienic toilet. With this loan, she will build a septic tank latrine to improve the family's living conditions and contribute to environmental protection. In this photo, she is pictured first from the left.

loans.use: To pay for the construction of a sanitary latrine with a device for hand-washing with soap

loans.name: Atilio

texts.es:
Atilio, de 64 años de edad, es un hombre trabajador y muy responsable dedicado totalmente a la agricultura. El grupo familiar está conformado por sus 3 hijos y 3 hijas quienes le ayudan en las labores agrícolas y del hogar. 

Atilio, siempre se ha dedicado a la agricultura desde que trabajaba junto con su padre, cultivando maíz, frijol y maicillo. 
Con la ayuda de su papá ha aprendido mucho sobre cómo tratar los cultivos y así poder producir más. Además tiene un vehículo y una maquina desgranadora de maíz que le ayudan mucho a la hora que alguien necesite un viaje o después de la cosecha de maíz; Atilio, está disponible para ayudarle a la gente de su comunidad. 

Con el préstamo Atilio comprará 3 sacos de fertilizante e insecticidas para 3,500 metros cuadrados de cultivo de sandía y además va a comprar una novilla de repasto. 
Su sueño es, seguir cultivando granos básicos para la alimentación de sus hijos. pero además  quiere en un futuro comprar más ganado y así poco a apoco ir mejorando sus ingresos.
texts.en:
Atilio, 64 years of age, is a hard-working and very responsible man who is totally dedicated to agriculture. His family group is composed of three sons and 3 daughters who help him with the agricultural and household work. Atilio has always been dedicated to farming since the days when he worked with his father cultivating corn, beans, and sorghum.

Aided by his father, Atilio learned a lot about caring for crops and how to produce more. In addition, he has a vehicle and a corn husking machine which helps him a great deal at a time when he has to travel and right after the corn harvest. Atilio is also available to help others in his community.

With this loan, he will purchase three sacks of fertilizer and insecticides for his 3,500 square meters of watermelon. In addition, he wishes to buy a heifer to put out to pasture.

Atilio's dream is to continue cultivating basic grains to feed his children, and, in addition, he wants to purchase more cattle in the future and little by little, to continue improving his income.

loans.use: buy three sacks of fertilizer and insecticides to apply to 3,500 square meters of cultivated watermelon, and to buy a heifer to pasture.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase new stylish women's clothes to sell

loans.name: Hellen

texts.en:
Hellen used her previous loan from VisionFund Kenya to purchase milk for resale. It has been profitable, and she has been able to repay her loan on schedule. She also has a motorcycle transport business.

Hellen will be using this loan to pay her children's school fees and ensure that they get a good education. She also plans to buy more supplies of milk to resell and thus be able to serve more customers and earn more income. 

Hellen will use her anticipated profits to both expand her business and repay the loan.

This is her sixth loan term with VisionFund Kenya, and Hellen has been successfully repaying her previous loans. In the future, she hopes to expand her business, earn more income, and be able to afford to educate her children.

loans.use: to both pay her children's school fees and purchase milk to resell.

loans.name: Im's Group

texts.en: Im is 47 years old and a mother of two children living in Kampong Cham province. She grows cassava on 1 hectare of land as her main source of income and works for others for a fee to supplement her income. For Im, this is her second loan from VisionFund (Kiva’s partner) and she has fully repaid her past loan. She leads a group of two to get new loan. As the group leader, she will spend her loan portion to buy more farmland. She hopes that she can get more yield than last year.

loans.use: To buy more farmland.

loans.name: Kater Al- Nada Group

texts.en:
These are the four members of the Kater Al-Nada group. All of them live in a working-class neighborhood of Hodidah city, Yemen. The whole group took out a loan of 80,000 YER from AMB.
Ghetha is the group's coordinator and is 35 years old. She has three children and lives with her family in a very poor quarter.

Ghetha operates a humble business of selling ready-made women's clothes door to door. Her capital is still very small. She works hard to improve it, but most of her profits go to cover household needs, and she doesn't have enough money. For this reason, she applied for a loan of 20,000 YER from AMB in order to purchase new women's clothes to resell.

Ghetha hopes to increase both her clientele and her income.

loans.use: to purchase new women's clothes for resale.

loans.name: Tork's Group

texts.en: Tork, 48, lives with family members in a rural village of the Kampong Cham province. She earns income to support her family by growing cassava on 2 hectares of land. For Tork, this is her seventh loan from VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). She has fully repaid back her past loans and has gradually improved her living conditions. In a group of two, she is the group leader. She will spend her loan portion to pay for fertilizer, pesticide, plowing and labor fees. She hopes that she can earn more income to grow vegetables.

loans.use: To pay for fertilizer, pesticide, plowing and labor fees.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a new rickshaw for her husband.

loans.name: Jose Angel

texts.es:
Jose, de 35 años de edad, está soltero, realizó sus estudios hasta 1ª año de bachillerato, es empleado desde hace un año en un hotel, con lo cual mantiene a su familia; junto a el, viven 4 miembros de su familia.
 
José, a parte de trabajar en el hotel también, se dedica al cultivo de hortalizas: chiles, cebollas; para la temporada de cosecha, su hermana se encarga de ir al mercado a comercializarlo.

A medida fue pasando el tiempo José, tomo experiencia de este oficio que realizaba su padre. 

José, solicita el préstamo para comprar postes para cercar un potrero y darle mantenimiento al terreno. 

El sueño de José, es mejorar su calidad de vida y la de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Jose is 35 years old, is single, and lives with four members of his family.  He studied up to Grade 10 and has been working as a hotel employee for a year. This is how he supports his family. 

Besides working at the hotel, Jose grows garden produce such as hot peppers and onions. In the harvest season, his sister is in charge of going to the market to sell the produce. As time went by, Jose gained experience in this trade, which his father used to follow.

Jose is requesting a loan to buy posts to fence a pasture and to maintain the plot of land.

Jose's dream is to improve his quality of life and that of his children.

loans.use: to buy posts to fence a pasture and maintain the plot of land.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy farm inputs

loans.name: Ruben

texts.en: Ruben is a 51-year-old married father of five children from Ormoc, Leyte. He has been engaged in a pig-raising business for more than five years now. Ruben is asking for a loan to buy piglets and animal feed. With this loan, he will be able to grow more pigs which he can sell to the market after several weeks. This loan will help Ruben improve the productivity of his business and his income. In the future, Ruben wants to improve his livelihood and save money for his children’s schooling.

loans.use: to buy piglets and animal feed

loans.name: Salita

texts.en: Salita is a 50-year-old married mother of six children from Ormoc, Leyte. She has been engaged in retail sales of rice for more than five years now. This is the source of her income. Salita is asking for a loan to buy more rice to sell. This loan will enable her to improve her stock, thus allowing her to sell more to her customers. In the future, Salita hopes of making her business more sustainable and profitable. Moreover, she wants to save money for her children’s schooling.

loans.use: to buy more rice to sell

loans.name: Wilfredo

texts.es:
Wilfredo, de 41 años de edad, es pescador, debido a su situación económica no pudo seguir estudiando, actualmente esta casado, tiene un hijo de 9 años que aun esta estudiando.

Wilfredo, se dedicó a la pesca juntamente con su padre, quien le enseñó el trabajo; su esposa se dedica a la venta de mariscos, y él también se dedica al comercio de marisco y al cultivo de maíz.

Wilfredo, solicita el crédito para comprar camarones y pescado, este tipo de productos son los que más se venden, en los lugares aledaños a su comunidad.

El sueño de Wilfredo, es tener una vivienda digna y un mejor estilo de vida para su familia y así mejorar y asegurar el futuro de su hijo.
texts.en:
Wilfredo, aged 41, is a fisher who could not carry on studying due to his financial situation. He is married and has a 9-year-old son who attends school.

Wilfredo goes fishing with his father, who taught him the trade. His wife sells seafood, as does Wilfredo, who additionally cultivates corn.

Wilfredo is asking for the loan to buy shrimps and fish, as these are the products that sell best in the neighboring areas of his community.

Wilfredo dreams of having a a decent house and a better lifestyle for his family so as to better and secure his son's future.

loans.use: to buy shrimp and fish.

loans.name: William

texts.en:
Fifteen years ago, William started farming on a small inherited piece of land in Tebesonik, a remote village in the Litein area of Kenya. Today, this humble father of six children sells milk, eggs, tea and a variety of food crops. He is a passionate farmer, and, because of the immense knowledge he has of farming, he commands a lot of respect from other farmers in his village. Dairy farming is close to his heart. Every day he wakes up to milk his cows, and that makes him very proud.

Although he makes profits through selling milk, he lacks a proper dairy unit, and he is seeking a loan to build a modern dairy unit. Through the loan, he will have a humble time milking and feeding his cows. A good dairy unit provides a good place where cows can relax and also prevents them from getting diseases that may arise through exposure to harsh weather conditions such as rain.

William believes that through this loan, his living conditions will change because he is going to have an increase in milk production. He will save money that he used to spend on treating his cows because he lacked a good dairy unit. With his drive and ambition, he sees himself generating employment through employing someone to help him in his dairy business. William waits for your kindness.

loans.use: To build a modern dairy unit.

loans.name: Bernarda

texts.es:
Bernarda, de 67 años de edad, realizó sus estudios hasta 5° grado, es ama de casa, tiene 8 hijos, de los cuales solo dos viven en casa, ambos son agricultores. 

Bernarda, se dedica al negocio de venta de pupusas y refresco.- Ella tiene que alquilar el local en donde vende las pupusas por temporada y de las ganancias mantiene su familia.

Bernarda, solicita el préstamo para comprar una ternera pequeña, ella desea emprender otro tipo de negocios y se enteró que la venta y compra de ganado es muy rentable. 

El sueño de Bernarda, es darles una mejor vida a su familia y a la ves poder ampliar su negocio.
texts.en:
Bernarda, 67, stayed in education until 5th grade. She is a housewife with 8 children, only two of whom live at home, they are both farmers.  

Bernarda has a business selling stuffed tortillas and refreshments - She has to seasonally rent the shop where she sells the stuffed tortillas and use her earnings to maintain her family.

Bernarda is asking for a loan to buy a small calf, she wants to undertake other types of businesses and she has learnt that buying and selling cattle is very profitable. 

Bernarda dreams of giving her family a better life and at the same time being able to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy a small calf

loans.name: Rosita

texts.en: Rosita is a sari-sari (variety) store owner from Ormoc, Leyte. She is married and has four children. Rosita has been in the business for more than five years now. She sells various goods including soap, detergent, cooking oil and condiments. Rosita would like a loan to buy more merchandise to sell like canned goods, noodles, soda, beverages, soap, toiletries, coffee, sugar, candies, snack foods, and condiments. Rosita believes that this loan will enable her to improve her stock, thus attracting more customers to buy in her store. Rosita’s future plans include the expansion of her business as well as to send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy more merchandise to sell like canned goods, noodles, soda, soap, toiletries, coffee, sugar, candies, snack foods, and condiments.

loans.name: Nhóm 19-Bình Xuyên Group

texts.en: Thuy, pictured first from the right, is 38 years old. She is married with three small children. She has been a member of the local Women's Union since 1996. Her husband has been sick for the whole year. Her family is classified as a poor family and cannot afford to have a sanitary latrine. With this loan, Thuy will use the funds to build a toilet which will improve the living conditions for the family members by preventing diseases commonly associated with unhygienic toilets.

loans.use: To pay for the construction of a sanitary latrine with a device for hand-washing with soap

loans.name: Shahnaz's Group

texts.en:
Shahnaz is a 48-year-old married woman living with her family in Lahore, Pakistan. Her son drives a van which is the only income source for the family. This van does not belong to him so he has to pay a daily fare to the van owner. He wants to buy his own used van to drive so that he would no longer have to pay the fare. 
Therefore, Shahnaz requested a loan from BRAC Pakistan, which is the field partner of Kiva. Shahnaz hopes that through this loan and savings, her son would be able to buy a used van. 
Shahnaz is grateful to Kiva and its field partner BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy a used van for her son's business.

loans.name: Ana Lidia

texts.es:
Ana, de 48 años de edad, estudió hasta 9º grado, es comerciante, es viuda y tiene 3 hijos. 

Ana, administra una tienda desde hace 8 años.- Ella lo aprendió de su padre, cuando se casó decidió dedicarse al negocio, por la demanda de clientes y la necesidad de algunos productos básicos que las personas necesitaban. 

Ana, solicita el préstamo para comprar aceite, arroz, frijoles, maíz, entre otros productos de vital importancia.- También, para reparar su carro y así poder trabajar mejor. 

El sueño de Ana, es poder ampliar más su negocio y así heredarles el negocio a sus hijos para que ellos puedan administrarlo.
texts.en:
Ana is 48 years old and has a ninth grade education. She is a retailer and a widow, and she has three children. Ana has been running her store for the past eight years. She learned the business from her father. When she got married she decided to work in this field because of customers' demand and people's need for certain basic products.

Ana is requesting this loan to buy oil, rice, beans, corn, and other essential products. She will also use it to repair her car so that she can work better. Ana's dream is to be able to further expand her business and then leave it to her children for them to manage.

loans.use: to buy oil, rice, beans, corn, and other products.

loans.name: Amina

texts.en: Amina is 28 years old, married and has three children. She lives in a village. Amina is engaged in the livestock business and her sons help her in the work. She has been engaged in this activity for six years. She likes milking cows and providing the family with milk and dairy products. Amina is taking out a loan to buy a few head of cattle for expanding her livestock business. She hopes for your support.

loans.use: To purchase cattle

loans.name: Sarah

texts.en: Sarah is a rice retailer from Ormoc, Leyte. She is married and has six grown-up children. Sarah has been engaged in rice retailing for more than 18 years now. This is the source of her income. Sarah is asking for a loan to buy more rice to sell. With a loan, she will be able to improve her stock thus allowing her to sell more to her customers. In the future, Sarah hopes of making her business a success.

loans.use: to buy more rice to sell

loans.name: Teresita

texts.en: Teresita is a 51-year-old married mother of three children from Ormoc, Leyte. Teresita operates a small sari-sari (variety) store business selling various items to the people in her community. Teresita has been in the business for more than 30 years now. Teresita is requesting a loan to buy more stock to sell like canned goods, noodles, soda, beverages, bread, snack foods, and condiments. With a loan, she will be able to improve her inventory thus attracting more buyers to her store. In the future, Teresita hopes of making her business a success.

loans.use: to buy more canned goods, noodles, soda, beverages, bread, snack foods, condiments and other items.

loans.name: Annabella

texts.en:
Annabella is 53 years old and married with three children. She works very hard to provide for them.

Annabella runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase more groceries to sell. She has been in this business for nine years and sells a variety of items such as snack food, canned goods, and other groceries.

In the future Annabella would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Caryl Jean

texts.en:
Caryl Jean is 30 years old and married.

Caryl Jean is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs. She has been raising pigs for four years now, and has borrowed three times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Caryl Jean would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Jane

texts.en:
Jane is a married mother of 3 children, all of whom attend school. She lives in her own house that has neither electricity nor piped water.

Jane has operated a retail shop business for the past year, selling household consumables such as wheat flour, maize flour, and sugar. She faces the major challenge of creditors needing a long period of time to pay for goods purchased on credit. 

With this 20,000 KES loan she is requesting, Jane wishes to purchase supplies of sugar, rice, maize flour, and wheat flour. 

Jane decided to join Yehu Microfinance Trust to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase supplies of sugar, rice, maize flour, and wheat flour.

loans.name: Octavio De Jesus

texts.es:
Octavio con 52 años de edad, vive soltero. Durante su vida productiva se ha dedicado a diversas actividades de manera independiente, con lo que ha generado ingresos para el sostenimiento de sus padres. 
Hace 10, comenzó a realizar la actividad de comercialización de cerdos, pues los compra, los cría, engorda y posteriormente los vende según el peso adquirido por el animal, esto le permite obtener los recursos para continuar con el cuidado y sustento de sus padres. 
El titular es un hombre luchador, pujante, se esmera cada día para salir adelante motivado por su familia, esto lo impulsó a solicitar el crédito con la Corporación Interactuar, para invertirlo en la compra de cerdos y lechones, así podrá tener disponibilidad suficiente para cumplir con los pedidos que le solicitan y mejorará su margen de utilidad e ingresos. 
De esta manera, Octavio espera avanzar un paso más hacia el cumplimiento de su sueño principal, que es formalizar su negocio y montar un expendio de carne, que sea rentable y perdurable en el tiempo y lograr una estabilidad económica para darle a sus padres buenas condiciones de vida.
Mejora la vida de este colombiano con un préstamo!
texts.en:
Octavio is 52 years old and single. Throughout his working life, he has had several occupations as a freelancer with which he made enough money to support his parents.

Ten years ago, he got into the pig business. He buys, breeds and fattens them to sell them later at a price that varies with their weight. This allows him to make enough profits to keep caring for and supporting his parents. 

Octavio is a vigorous and hardworking man. He strives every day to get ahead motivated by his family. This encouraged him to request a loan from "Interactuar" to buy pigs and piglets. This way he will be able to fill the orders placed and increase his profit margin.

With the loan, Octavio hopes to take a step forward towards his main dream. He wishes to formalize his business and set up a meat market that is profitable and lasts over time so that he can achieve economic stability to provide his parents with good living conditions.

Improve this colombian man's life with a loan!

loans.use: to buy pigs and piglets.

loans.name: Nhóm 24-Bình Xuyên Group

texts.en: Toan, pictured first from the right, is 32 years old. She works in the agricultural sector and earns approximately VND 740,000. She is married with three small children. She has been a member of the local Women's Union since 2000. Her husband is weak and her family is classified as a poor family. Due to the lack of funds, her household does not have a sanitary latrine yet. This loan will help Toan build a septic tank latrine which will improve the family's hygiene and health and contribute to sanitary improvement in her community.

loans.use: to pay for the construction of a sanitary latrine with a device for hand-washing with soap

loans.name: Nancy Del Rosario

texts.es:
Nancy tiene 47 años de edad, es madre soltera. Vive junto a su hijo en casa propia construida de material noble en el distrito de Morropón, región Piura, en la costa norte de Perú. La vida en el lugar es tranquila, sus pobladores se dedican a la agricultura, ganadería y comercio.

Ella se dedica a la venta de pollo pelado por kilos, con más de 07 años de experiencia en el negocio. Su negocio se encuentra ubicado en su domicilio. El pollo lo vende a los moradores vecinos de dicho pueblo joven. El préstamo será utilizado para la compra de una mayor cantidad de pollo vivo y compra de alimento balanceado para engorde de estos. Con esto Nancy espera hacer crecer su negocio, aumentando la calidad del producto que ofrece a sus clientes para poder satisfacer sus gustos y preferencias, lo cual tendrá un impacto positivo en sus ingresos, mejorando su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Nancy is a 47 year old single mother. She lives with her son in her own house built of solid materials in the district of Morropón, Piura region, in the north coast of Peru.  Life in that area is relaxed and people work in agriculture, cattle and trade.

She works selling plucked chicken by the kilo. She has more than 7 years of experience. She runs her business from her house.  She sells the chicken to local customers, neighbors of the town. She will use the loan to buy more live chickens and balanced feed to fatten them.  With this Nancy hopes to grow her business by increasing the quality of the product she sells and satisfy the taste and likes of her customers.  This will have a positive impact on her income improving the quality of life for her and her family.

loans.use: to buy a larger quantity of live chickens and balanced feed to fatten them.

loans.name: Linah

texts.en:
Linah is a married woman with three children, all of whom attend school. She lives in her own house, which has neither electricity nor piped water.

She has operated a retail shop business for the past two years, selling household consumables like wheat flour, maize flour, and sugar. She faces a major challenge of transportation in her business.

With the loan of 20,000 Kenya shillings (KES), she wants to purchase stock of sugar, rice, maize flour, and wheat flour. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase stock of sugar, rice, maize flour, and wheat flour.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy wood, nails, mats, cement, sand and bricks among others.

loans.name: Yenifer Xiomara

texts.es:
Yenifer, de 19 años de edad, realizó sus estudios hasta 8º grado, es ama de casa, actualmente esta acompañada, su pareja es pescador y tienen una niña de 9 meses. 

Yenifer, se dedica a la venta de pescado desde hace dos años, ella aprendió ese tipo de trabajo de su cónyuge quien realiza el trabajo de pescar para que ella lo comercialice.

Yenifer, solicita el préstamo para comprar redes camaroneras, para mejorar su equipo de trabajo y así poder mejorar su negocio. 

El sueño de Yenifer, es tener su propio transporte para llevar su mercadería a sus clientes y así tener mejores ganancias.
texts.en:
Yenifer, aged 19, went to school until eighth grade. She is a homemaker, in a relationship and has a nine month old daughter with her partner, who is a fisherman.

Yenifer has been selling fish for a living for the past two years. She learned the trade from her partner, who catches the fish that she sells.

Yenifer is asking for the loan to buy shrimp nets so as to improve her working tools and thus increase her income.

Yenifer dreams of having her own transportation device, which would enable her to take her goods directly to her customers and therefore improve her income.

loans.use: to buy shrimp nets.

loans.name: Fathia 14 October Group

texts.en:
This group is called Fathia 14 October and is composed of five women. They applied for a loan of 270,000 YER from AMB.

The president of the group is Fathia. She is 50 years old, married, and has three children. Her husband works as a soldier with a small salary. The house where Fathia and her family live is small and not enough for all the members of the family. Fathia strives to expand the house but she doesn't have enough construction materials to do. For this reason, she applied for a loan of 60,000 YER from AMB in order to purchase construction materials such as carpentry tools, cement, bricks, and other things to build two rooms to expand the house.

Fathia looks forward to having a large house to be enough for all the members of the family.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials such as carpentry tools, cement, bricks, and other things to build two rooms to expand the house.

loans.name: Rosemary

texts.en:
Rosemary is a married woman with three children who attend school. She lives in a rental house that has electricity but no piped water.

For over three years, she has operated a clothes selling business, selling from door to door and from home to her neighbours and passersby. She faces a major challenge of seasonality in her business.

With the loan of 20,000 KES that she is requesting she wants to purchase a bale of kids wear clothes for resale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase a bale of kids wear clothes for resale

loans.name: Mania

texts.en: Mania is 56 years old. She lives in Kareli district with her grandson. Mania is involved in agricultural activities. In particular, she owns a plot of agricultural land, where she grows fruits and vegetables to sell locally. Mania decided to start a husbandry business and requested a loan. The Start Up program, which is a joint initiative with Kiva and Credo enables her to get a loan of 2200 GEL to purchase a cow. When the cow is purchased she will start producing dairy products and will resell them among her villagers. This will increase her income and with increased income she will be able to expand her husbandry business gradually. Mania awaits your support.

loans.use: to purchase a cow

loans.name: Lenox's Group

texts.en:
Lenox's Group was formed by eleven farmers in Teso District and is being represented by Lenox, who is the group leader pictured above. He is 28 years old, is married, and has three children. Lenox has been a farmer for ten years and is often referred to as a very hardworking individual.

Lenox isn’t new to One Acre Fund. He actually joined the program in 2014 and has since noticed his life has changed, especially in the sense that he has been able to consistently feed his family ever since.

This year, Lenox will not only get fertilizer and maize seeds as part of his loan, but will also purchase a solar light. He is very excited about this addition, since now he will be able to have light during dark hours for his children to be able to study.

Using this loan, Lenox's Group will purchase a total of five solar lights and use the farming inputs received to plant a total of 7.5 acres.

loans.use: to purchase a solar light, as well as hybrid seeds and fertilizer to improve harvests of maize.

loans.name: Nhóm 26-Bình Xuyên Group

texts.en:
Toan, pictured first from the right, is a 54-year-old farmer who makes about VND 780,000 monthly. She is married, though her husband is now sick and weak, and she has 2 grown-up, married children. She has been a member of the local Women's Union since 1994. 

Due to the family's economic hardship, her household does not have a hygienic latrine. With this loan, Toan will be able to build a hygienic toilet in her home which will improve her family's hygiene and health, and will contribute to the sanitary improvement of her community.

loans.use: to pay for the construction of a sanitary latrine, with a device for hand-washing with soap

loans.name: Doris Group

texts.en:
Doris is 42 years old and has seven children. She has been a farmer for twenty years and is always said to be a very hardworking individual. Even though Doris is the only one featured in the above picture, she is actually representing her group formed by ten farmers in Webuye District, Kenya.

Doris started working alongside One Acre Fund a few years ago, in 2009, and decided to do so because she wanted to have access to quality training and acquire new farming methods. Since then, she has seen her life improve, especially in the sense that she has had more profits from each harvest ever since. This year, she decided to represent her group because she wanted to help more farmers.

Doris’ Group will receive farming inputs to plant a total of 5.75 acres of land. Additionally, some of the farmers in the group will be purchasing a solar light so, with this loan, the group will also receive a total of five solar lights.

loans.use: to buy cost-efficient maize seeds and fertilizer for the coming harvesting season.

loans.name: Claire's Group

texts.en:
Claire is 36 years old and has 6 children. She is a group leader and is representing her group formed by 14 farmers in Matete District, Kenya. 

Claire has been farming with One Acre Fund for some years now, having joined the program for the first time in 2011. This decision was largely a result of her desire to have access to quality training and acquire new farming methods and, although she described her last harvest as excellent, she believes she can have a better one this year by continuing to work alongside One Acre Fund. Claire also decided to purchase a solar light as part of her loan, which she is very excited about, as it will allow her to have light during the night in order to feel safer.

Obtaining this loan means that Claire's Group will be able to receive a total of 12 solar lights, as well as farming inputs to plant a total of 8.75 acres.

loans.use: to purchase a solar light and gain access to cost efficient hybrid seeds and fertilizer for maize cultivation.

loans.name: Nhóm 28-Bình Xuyên Group

texts.en:
Chiem, 33, works in agricultural production and earns a monthly income of approximately VND 790,000. She is married with 3 little children who are still in school. She has been a member of the local Women's Union since 2007. 

Now her family is experiencing economic hardship and they cannot afford to have a hygienic toilet. With this loan, she will build a septic tank latrine to improve the family's living conditions and contribute to environmental protection. 

In this photo, she is pictured first from the left.

loans.use: to pay for the construction of a sanitary latrine, with a device for hand-washing with soap

loans.name: Jenerica

texts.en:
Jenerica has mastered her swine production in Lopez Jaena, Misamis Occidental, Philippines. This is how she makes a living supporting her husband in raising their family.

She was at her lowest point when she didn't have enough capital for her business. When she joined PMPC, she was truly grateful to avail herself of credit to fully support her business.

Just as she takes care of her swine production business, so it is with her membership with PMPC. She wants to maintain her membership in good standing so that she can always apply for any financing she may need.

This loan of PHP 5,000 will be used to purchase bags of gestating feeds for her swine. Jenerica hopes and prays that her business will grow because that will help her save enough for future emergencies. She wishes to live a happy and healthy life with her family.

loans.use: to purchase bags of gestating feeds for her swine

loans.name: Dilmurod

texts.ru:
Дилмурод женат у него двое детей. Ему 42 года. Образование у Дилмурода среднее. Дилмурод торгует в городском рынке запасными частями и инструментами(молоток, плоскогубцы,гвозди и т.п.  Это торговля  является единственным источником дохода его семьи. Жена Дилмурода  шьет на дому национальные платья для женщин. Дети учатся в школе. Так как сам Дилмурод не получил  высшее  образование он хочет, чтобы его дети выучились и стали образованными. 

Для того чтобы получать больший доход от бизнеса Дилмуроду необходимо расширить ассортимент  товаров. Для этой цели  он и  хочет взять кредит. По совету знакомых он обратился в "Арванд" так как организация находится недалеко от рынка и его устраивают условия предоставления услуг. Дилмурод надеется, что взяв кредит он сможет улучшить финансовое положение своей семьи.
texts.en:
Dilmurod is 42 years old, married, and has two children.  He has the equivalent of a high school education and works in the city market selling spare parts and tools such as hammers, pliers, nails etc. for a living.  The money he makes selling these items is the main source of income for his family.  Dilmurod's wife works out of home sewing Tajikistani dresses for women, and his children are in grade school.  As Dilmurod himself never had the opportunity to get a university education, he wants his children to study and become educated.

To earn more income from his business, Dilmurod needs to expand his offering of goods for sale.  To this end, he wants to take out a loan, and, on the advice of some people he knows, has requested one from Arvand as they're located near the marketplace and feels their conditions for granting loans suit him.  Dilmurod hopes that he'll be able to improve his family's financial situation by taking this loan out.

loans.use: buy tools and spare parts to expand his offering of goods for sale

loans.name: José Ándres

texts.es:
José, de 45 años de edad, es jornalero, padre de 12 hijos, estudió hasta tercer grado, las condiciones económicas de su familia no le permitieron seguir estudiando, pero con esfuerzo y trabajo a logrado sacar adelante a su familia.- Junto a su esposa, han trabajado arduo para garantizar a su familia las condiciones básicas.

José, trabaja en la agricultura, cultivando maíz y frijol, esta labor la hace en la época lluviosa, ya que en el verano se dedica a la elaboración de teja artesanal; el trabaja en las tejeras desde muy pequeño, su padre fue quien le enseño el oficio, en este negocio también se involucran 4 de sus hijos.

El crédito lo necesita para comprar materiales que se necesitan para la elaboración de tejas, con la inversión  cubrirá un pedido que tiene para el inicio de año, esto significara mejores ingresos para su familia. 

En este momento  no cuenta los recursos económicos suficientes, pero con la ayuda del préstamo podrá aprovechar la oportunidad.

José, sueña con tener una gran empresa, donde su numerosa familia pueda participar en el negocio y garantizar una fuente de ingreso y así cubrir con sus gastos familiares.
texts.en:
José, 45 years old, is a day laborer, father of 12 kids, and attended school until the third grade. The economic needs of his family did not allow him to continue studying, but with hard work and perseverance he has provided for his family. Together with his wife, the two have worked arduously to guarantee the basic needs for their family. 

José works in agriculture, growing corn and beans, which he does in the rainy season. In the summer he makes a living making artisanal tiles. He has worked with tiles since he was young. His father taught him the business and he too employs four of his kids in the craft. 

The loan will be used to buy the materials needed to create tiles and will cover an order that he has for the beginning of the year. This means greater income for his family. 

Currently he does not have sufficient economic means, but with the help of the loan he can seize the opportunity. 

José dreams of having a big business where his large family can work and that will serve as a guaranteed source of income that will cover his family’s expenses.

loans.use: to buy the materials he needs to make tiles

loans.name: Benson's Group

texts.en:
Benson's Group is formed by 10 farmers in Webuye District and is being represented by Benson, who is the group leader pictured above. He is 45 years old and married, and has 3 children. Benson has been a farmer for 20 years and is often referred to as a very friendly person.

Benson isn’t new to One Acre Fund as he actually joined the program in 2013. He has since noticed that his life has changed, especially in the sense that he has had a healthier life due to better nutrition. 

This year, Benson will not only get fertilizer and maize seeds as part of his loan, but he will also purchase two solar lights. He is very excited about this addition since now he will be able to have light during the dark hours for his children to be able to study.

Using this loan, Benson's Group will purchase a total of 10 solar lights and use the farming inputs received to plant a total of 4.5 acres.

loans.use: to purchase two solar lights, as well as hybrid seeds and fertilizer to improve maize harvests

loans.name: Aisanat

texts.en:
Aisanat is a freshman at the American University of Central Asia, Department of Economics. Here is her story:

“I was born and finished the 2nd grade in Oi-Bulak village in Issyk-Kul region of Kyrgyzstan. After that we moved to Bishkek due to my father’s work. We rented a house, saved money and just in 2012 were able to buy a flat here. There are four in our family: my father, my mother, my younger brother and me. My mother is a housewife and my father is the only breadwinner in our family. The salary of my father is hardly enough for our daily expenses, as we eat, pay utilities and pay for our education. My brother studies at one of the local high schools. We have two more members of our family, two daughters of my uncle, who died in 2001. His daughters study at school and my father supports them in order to give them an education, so that they could be able to be independent in the future.

I had hard school-days when I transferred to the school in Bishkek in the 3rd grade. I felt the significant difference between the education system of rural and town schools. I had to study more than others, train extra at home, and catch up with my classmates. Thanks to God and my mother’s help, I was able even surpass my classmates and in the 9th grade entered the Kyrgyz-Turkish High School for girls. I learnt Turkish and English, became an Olympiad participant and graduated successfully.

I think I live when I study and learn more about the world. I look at my father and see how hard he is working and only just meeting the ends. The reason of my appeal for a Kiva loan is my desire to help my parents to pay for my tuition, to contribute to a better standard of living.”

loans.use: to pay for her higher education

loans.name: Socheata

texts.en: Socheata is a 19-year-old student who is from Svay Reang province in Cambodia. She studies accounting major in her third year at an institute in the city. Her father is a teacher, her mother cultivates rice and she also fattens pigs to sell. Socheata doesn’t have enough money to pay her tuition fees, so she would like to apply for a loan. This loan will help her graduate successfully. For her dream after graduation, she hopes to find a job with a reasonable salary.

loans.use: to pay her tuition fees

loans.name: Marcelina

texts.en:
Marcelina owned and managed house spaces for rental in Lopez Jaena, Philippines. This business has been doing well in supporting the needs of her family.

Recently, she borrowed an amount to purchase construction materials for her house spaces to provide a safe and comfortable stay and be able to draw more occupants. This will help her sustain the needs of her family and her children's education.

She wants to expand her business and aspires to have a commercial building in a nearby town.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials for her house spaces to provide a safe and comfortable stay and be able to draw more occupants

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase construction materials to renovate the rest of the building to rent.

loans.name: Felix

texts.es:
Félix es una persona casada de 61 años de edad, tiene 8 hijos, pero con él ya solo viven unos cuantos y uno de sus hijos es el que le ayuda en sus actividades, el vive en una comunidad de Sololá.
Félix  para la generación de sus ingresos, se dedica a la siembra de hortalizas, este trabajo lo aprendió desde pequeño,  y con este ha sacado adelante a sus hijos, a Felix le gusta convivir con la naturaleza, pues una de las hortalizas que siembra mas es la arveja dulce, ya que este producto no es muy común, y no todos los agricultores lo siembran,  porque es muy delicado y necesita de mucho cuidado y dedicarle mucho tiempo. Félix del poco capital que tenía lo invirtió en la nueva siembra, ahora él no cuenta con suficiente capital para mantenerlo el poco capital que le queda no le alcanza para darle mantenimiento, pues la salida más viable  para él es conseguir un prestamo, para comprar todo lo necesario y esperar la buena cosecha. 
Félix además de ser agricultor, él también se dedica a la venta de tablas por docena, es otra actividad que él realiza para complementar los ingresos y poder  cubrir todas las necesidades del hogar. El prestamo que necesita Félix es de cuatro mil setecientos cincuenta quetzales
texts.en:
Félix is 61 years old and married. He has 8 children, although only a few still live with him. One of his sons, who lives in a community in Sololá, helps him with his work. 

Félix makes a living growing vegetables. He learnt how to do this when he was little and his income from this job has enabled him to bring up his children. Felix likes to coexist with nature. One of the vegetables he grows is sweet pea which is not a very common product that not all farmers grow because it is very delicate and it requires a lot of time and good care. The little money that Félix had, he invested in his new crop. Now he does not have enough money to maintain it and for him the most viable solution is to get a loan to purchase what he needs to produce a good harvest.  

In addition to being a farmer, Félix also sells tables by the dozen. This is another job he does in order to provide enough income to cover his household expenses. The loan that Félix needs is for the amount of four thousand seven hundred and fifty quetzals.

loans.use: to maintain his crops.

loans.name: Nhóm 25-Bình Xuyên Group

texts.en: Yen, 32, works as a farmer with a monthly income of about VND 760,000. She is married with two little children. She has been a member of the local Women's Union since 2008. Her family is classified as a poor family and could not afford to have a sanitary latrine. With this loan, Yen will use the funds to build a septic tank toilet. This will improve the living conditions for the family members by preventing diseases commonly associated with unhygienic toilets. In this photo, she is pictured first from the left.

loans.use: To pay for the construction of a sanitary latrine, with a device for hand-washing with soap.

loans.name: Zubayda

texts.ru:
Зубайда молодая девушка из района Вахш. Ей 19 лет. Она живет вместе с родителями, двумя братьями и сестрой. Его отец и брат занимаются производством гравированных сундуков. Каждую стенку сундука они пилят и гравируют вручную. Это очень кропотливая и аккуратная работа. Зубайда часто поддерживает своих родных в работе.
  Зубайда дома занимается шитьем национальной женской одежды на заказ. Для нее это он удобно. Она может совместить домашние дела и шитье. Пришла зима время холодов и семья Зубайды не смогла во время закончить ремонт дома, из-за того у них закончились средства на приобретения строй материалов. Зубайда считает себя ответственной и самостоятельной, и хочет получить кредит для купли стройматериалов.
texts.en:
Zubayda is a young woman from the Vakhsh District. She is 19 years old. She lives with her parents, two brothers and one sister. Her father and brother make engraved wooden trunks. They saw and engrave each side of the trunk by hand. This is very time consuming and painstaking work. Zubayda often assists her family with their work.

Zubayda sews custom-made Tajik-style women's clothing in her home. It is convenient for her. She is able to combine her household chores and her sewing. The winter cold has arrived and Zubayda's family was not able to finish their home repairs on time because they used up all of the funds needed to buy construction materials. Zubayda considers herself responsible and self-sufficient. She wants to receive a loan to buy construction materials.

loans.use: to buy construction materials to finish her family's home repairs.

loans.name: Valentina

texts.en: As a good mother and responsible wife, Valentina never gets tired of supporting her husband in raising their family. She has four children, and the family lives in Upper Puntod, Lopez Jaena. From her desire to earn a living on her own, she started a snack vending business.  Her business is doing well and she spends a lot of  time perfecting her own food snacks recipe. She has maximized her profits and keeps pursuing her goals for the good of her family. She has requested another loan from PMPC, to buy additional raw ingredients for her food snacks in order to cater to more customers and be able to accept orders for additional earnings. She hopes and prays that her business would grow and sales increase. In the future, Valentina wishes to build a decent house for the family.

loans.use: to buy additional raw ingredients for her food snacks in order to cater to more customers and be able to accept orders.

location.town: Plaridel-Upper Puntod, Lopez Jaena, Misamis Occide

loans.name: Fernando

texts.en:
Fernando is a Peruvian artist who specializes in portraits and religious paintings. He would like to purchase new equipment for his workshop, including a jigsaw.

Fernando has been selling through NOVICA since 2000. This is his story:

"I've drawn and painted since childhood and I haven't found a better way to express myself than through my art. I'm concerned with the dignity of Peruvian identity and the equity that by natural law is deserved in honor of peace and happiness. Cuzco is the root of my essential motivation. My painting identifies with my country's beauty, and that beauty must be understood for its singularity and seen in the light of a country with its own language."

"I would like to start including wooden frames with my pieces in order to improve the overall presentation. I'd like to thank everyone who supports me through this microcredit, so that I can continue growing my business."

Use the link below to view Fernando's portraits and religious paintings on the NOVICA site:
http://www.novica.com/kiva/1642

loans.use: to purchase new equipment for his workshop, including a jigsaw

loans.name: Joyce's Group

texts.en:
Joyce, pictured above, is representing her group of 9 farmers in Webuye District and is happy to be working with One Acre Fund for the first time this year. Joyce has 7 children and is always described as a very friendly person, which is why she was selected to become the leader of her group.

Joyce has been a farmer for more than 30 years, and in order to earn enough to feed her family, she decided to join the One Acre Fund program this season. Her loan will not only include farming inputs but also a solar light, which she is very happy to be getting as that means she will now have light during dark hours for her children to be able to study. With the profits from this coming season, Joyce is planning to send her children to school.

A total of 7 acres will be planted by Joyce's Group, and between them they will receive a total of 3 solar lights.

loans.use: to purchase hybrid seeds and fertilizer for the cultivation of maize, as well as a solar light.

loans.name: Rodalyn

texts.en:
A married mother of three children, Rodalyn works hard to support her family. She has a charcoal retailing business in the Philippines and also earns income from pig fattening. Rodalyn is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF in order to replenish her stock of charcoal to sell.

Rodalyn has been sustaining her business activities through her past four loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream: to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional charcoal to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase building and kitchen supplies to set up his food stall

loans.name: Hillary

texts.en:
As the father of two children, the great desire to see them all grow up to be professionals is what fills Hillary with enthusiasm and inspiration. Hillary is 30 years old and works tirelessly to raise animals. Through these humble tasks, he aspires to offer all of his children a university education. Hillary learned to do farm work at a young age, thanks to his parents. He has a tiny plot of land to live off – just under half an acre – and has always struggled to support his family. Hillary has developed the farm in the sloping undulating terrain by successfully adopting suitable soil and water conservation methods such as stone pitched bench terracing and digging rain water storage pits. For over five years his income source has been from selling milk, poultry, and vegetables. He supplements the meager income by doing other personal business. Hillary passionately loves dairy farming. Milking and feeding his own cow is the most enjoyable part about farming. He is very appreciative that dairy farming has been able to sustain farmers in his village. Dairy farming is close to his heart and every day he wakes up to milk his cow and that makes him very proud. Although he makes profits through milk selling, he lacks a proper dairy unit and he is seeking a loan to build a modern dairy unit. Through the loan he will have a humble time milking his cow and also feeding it. A good dairy unit provides a good place where cows can relax and also prevent them from getting diseases that may arise because of being exposed to harsh weather conditions such as rain. Hillary believes that through this loan his living conditions will change because he is going to have an increase in milk production. He will save money that he used to spend on treating his cows because he lacked a good dairy unit.

He is hoping for a great year in 2015 in which he can generate employment In his dairy business

loans.use: To build a modern dairy unit

loans.name: Namig

texts.en: Namig and his wife have been married for seven years and have two children. The older of them is six years old and begins school this year. The younger child is four years old and is going to kindergarten. Namig is an IDP (Internally Displaced Person) from Gubadli city who now lives in the Baku region with his lovely family. His wife cares for their home and Namig is the sole breadwinner. He is in construction and because the quality of his work is very high, he has many customers. In order to expand his business, he has applied for a loan for 900 AZN (Azerbaijan New Manat) to buy construction materials, which will be useful in his work. He is thankful to Kiva lenders for their help. His goal for the future is to hire an assistant.

loans.use: to buy construction materials and expand his business.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase various kinds of incense, perfumes, accessories, and cosmetics  to sell door to door.

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es:
Juan, de 27 años de edad, trabaja como radio técnico, está soltero, vive con sus padres y a pesar de la pobreza está estudiando Ingeniería en Computación, con  mucho sacrificio esta estudiando y se le dificulta un poco por que también trabaja, pero es muy emprendedor.- Además, trabaja en la agricultura, su padre le apoya mucho para lograr las metas propuestas.

Juan Carlos tiene 5 años de trabajar como radio técnico.- Además, trabaja en la agricultura desde muy pequeño, ya que su padre le enseño a temprana edad, trabajan en conjunto y cada año siembran maíz y de la ganancia cubren necesidades del hogar y también compran herramientas que le solicitan en la universidad.

El crédito será utilizado para comprar 5 sacos de abono, veneno para la plaga y pagará la mano de obra para la preparación de la tierra.

El sueño de Juan, es graduarse de la Universidad, obtener un buen empleo para ayudarle a sus padres a que tengan una vida mejor.
texts.en:
Juan is 27 years old and works as a radio technician. He is single and lives with his parents. In spite of how poor he is, Juan is still studying computer engineering. He is having to sacrifice things to study, and it is difficult as he also works, but Juan is very enterprising. Juan also works in farming. His father supports him a lot in order to achieve his goals.

Juan has been working as a radio technician for five years. He has also worked in farming since he was very young as his father taught him this trade at a young age. Father and son work together, every year planting corn and using their profits to pay for household necessities and the tools that Juan needs for his university studies.

This loan will be used to buy five bags of manure and anti-disease treatments, and to pay labourers to prepare the ground.

Juan's dream is to graduate from university and to find a good job in order to help his parents to have better lives.

loans.use: to buy five bags of manure and anti-disease treatments, and to pay labourers to prepare the ground.

loans.name: Luis Arnoldo

texts.es:
Luis, de 45 años de edad, es mecánico, estudió hasta octavo grado, por diferentes circunstancias le fue imposible continuar, esta casado y junto a su pareja procrearon un hijo, que actualmente va a noveno grado y su esposa es ama de casa.

Luis, se ha dedicado a la mecánica por veinte años, tiene un pequeño taller en su casa y es de donde genera ingresos para cubrir algunas necesidades de su hogar.- Tambien, se dedica a la agricultura, siembra maíz y el terreno donde siembra, está a cuatro cuadras de casa, su esposa y su hijo le apoyan en el taller, mas dos empleados que tiene, para satisfacer la demanda de sus clientes.

El crédito será utilizado para comprar un aparato para soldar y algunas herramientas que hacen falta en el taller.

El sueño de Luis, es ampliar cada vez más su taller, para generar más ingresos y poder darle a su familia un mejor porvenir y así mismo dar empleo a más personas para que también salgan adelante.
texts.en:
Luis is 45 years old and a mechanic. He has a fifth grade education but, for various reasons, he was not able to continue at school. Luis is married and has a son with his wife. The couple's son is in ninth grade while Luis' wife is a housewife.

Luis has been a mechanic for 20 years and has a small garage at his house. It is at this business that Luis earns an income in order to cover some necessities for the household. Luis also works in farming: he grows corn on the same land at four blocks from his house. Luis' wife and son, as well as two employees, support him at the garage in order to fulfill customer demand.

This loan will be used to buy equipment to do soldering work and other tools that he needs in his garage.

Luis's dream is to continue expanding his garage in order to earn a higher income and offer his family a better future. He also wants to give other people jobs so that they too may move forward in life.

loans.use: to buy equipment to do soldering work and other tools that he needs in his garage.

loans.name: Alejandro

texts.en:
Alejandro is a Peruvian artisan who specializes in traditional Andean retablos. He would like to purchase raw materials, including wood and ceramic bisque.

Alejandro has been selling through NOVICA since 2002. This is his story:

"In every one of my works you can also find the labors of my wife, who molds the characters, as well as that of my nieces and nephews, whom I currently teach. The customs and traditions of the Andean people emerge in every retablo.

"I'd like to thank everyone who is supporting Peruvian artisans like myself. My goal is to expand the business that I inherited from my parents so that one day my children can continue my work and reach new heights."

Use this link to view Alejandro's traditional Andean retablos on the NOVICA site: http://www.novica.com/kiva/3210.

loans.use: to purchase raw materials, including wood and ceramic bisque

loans.name: Las Semillitas Group

texts.es: Este es el grupo “Las Semillitas” está conformada por 06 socios comprometidos y dinámicos. Maruja de 50 años de edad es soltera. Ella se dedica a la crianza y venta de cuyes y patos. Hace más de 05 años viene dedicándose a dicho negocio lo cual le es rentable. Su mayor deseo es complementar su negocio con la venta de comida. Es por ello que solicitó el crédito para la compra de alimento de crecimiento, engorde y vitamina. La Alcancía Comunal “Las Semillitas” agradece a las personas que hicieron posible este crédito.  Maruja es la tercera del lado derecho y viste polo celeste.
texts.en: This is the group 'Las Semillitas'. It is comprised of 6 dedicated and dynamic members. Maruja, who is 50 years old, is single. She makes a living with the breeding and sales of guinea pigs and ducks. For more than 5 years she has dedicated herself to this business, which is profitable. Her biggest wish is to complement her business with food sales. It is for this that she requests a loan to buy growth, fattening and vitamin food. The communal bank 'Las Semillitas' thanks the persons who made this loan possible. Maruja is third from the right and wears a sky-blue shirt.

loans.use: to buy growth, fattening and vitamine food

loans.name: Kiswend-Sida De Koanga Group

texts.fr:
Monsieur PALINGNABA est le représentant du groupe KISWENSIDA  DE KOANGA. Il se porte très bien. Marié, il est  père de 05 enfants. Le plus âgé à 18 ans et le moins âgé a 02 ans. 03 vont à l’école. Il a 05 personnes en charge.
Monsieur est éleveur depuis 20 ans. Il s’approvisionne dans le marché de son quartier. Ses clients sont les marchands.
Il veut s’acheter  05 moutons ; 10 poules.
Monsieur veut utiliser ses bénéfices pour la scolarisation de ses enfants et agrandir son activité. Il ambitionne être un grand éleveur.
texts.en:
Mr. PALINGUENABA is the representative of the group KISWENSIDA DE KOANGA. He is doing very well. He is a married father of five children. The oldest is 18 years old, and the youngest is 2. Three go to school, and he supports five people. 

Mr. Palinguenaba has been breeding animals for twenty years. He buys them at the local market. His customers are merchants. He wants to purchase 5 sheep and 10 hens. 

He will use his profits to support his children’s education and to expand his activity. His goal is to become a great breeder.

loans.use: to purchase 5 sheep and 10 hens.

loans.name: Tursunoy

texts.ru: Турсуной аккуратная ответственная и усидчивая женщина в возрасте 52 лет. Она живет в районе Чкаловск города Худжанд с двумя сыновьями, невесткой и внуками. Один ее сын работает охранником, а второй работает мастером в автомастерской. Невестка сидит дома и помогает свекрови в ее деятельности. Турсуной на протяжении 3 лет предоставляет услуги швеи. Она занимается пошивом женских национальных одеяний. Она приобрела достаточный опыт и теперь хотела бы расширить деятельность. Из-за нехватки денежных средств Турсуной просит кредит в размере 1500 долларов США для покупки новой модернизированной швейной машинки. Она хочет увеличить количество принимаемых заказов и сделать деятельность еще прибыльнее.
texts.en: Tursunoy is a meticulous, responsible and diligent woman. She is 52 years old. She lives in Khujand city in the Chkalovsk District with her two sons, daughter-in-law and grandchildren. One of her sons works as a security guard and the other works as a repairman in an auto mechanic shop. Her daughter-in-law stays at home and helps Tursunoy with her business. For the past three years, Tursunoy has been offering seamstress services. She sews Tajik-style women's clothing. She has acquired sufficient experience and now wants to expand her business. As she does not have enough money, Tursunoy is requesting a 1500 USD loan to buy a new, modernized sewing machine. She wants to increase the number of orders she takes and make her business even more profitable.

loans.use: to buy a modernized sewing machine.

loans.name: Patricia Maricela

texts.es:
Patricia, de 25 años de edad, realizó sus estudios hasta 9º grado, es comerciante y está casada; su pareja trabaja vendiendo frutas y verduras, solamente tienen un hijo de 7 años, que está estudiando y vive con ellos.

Patricia, tiene una tienda de víveres desde hace 5 años y fue una idea que surgió de su esposo, también se dedica juntamente  con su esposo a la venta de frutas y verduras, en los lugares aledaños. 

Patricia, solicita el préstamo para comprar dulces, golosinas, galletas, granos básicos, entre otros, para aprovechar la época de navidad, año nuevo y época de turismo en la zona donde ella reside y así mejorar sus ganancias. 

El sueño de Patricia, es que su negocio sea de mucha rentabilidad, mejorar sus ganancias y que su hijo tenga una buena educación y una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Patricia is 25 years old and has a ninth grade education. She is a businesswoman. Patricia is married; her husband works selling fruits and vegetables. The couple has just one son, age seven, who is in school and lives at home.

Patricia has had a grocery shop for five years. The idea for the shop came from Patricia's husband. Patricia also works with her husband selling fruits and vegetables in nearby areas.

Patricia is applying for this loan in order to buy sweets, candies, biscuits, basic grains and more. She can then take advantage of the Christmas and New Year holidays, when there is a lot of tourists in the area and she can earn a higher income.

Patrcia's dream is for her business to be much more profitable. She wants to earn higher profits and to give her son a good education and a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy sweets, candies, biscuits, basic grains and more.

loans.name: Sanam

texts.ru: Санам, 50 лет, есть 3 детей, замужем. Образование у Санам средне-специальное, работает медсестрой, в качестве дополнительного дохода для своей семьи, занимается животноводством и полеводством, стартовав 14 лет назад. Благодаря упорному труду Санам, на данный момент в ее хозяйстве имеется 2 коровы. Ежемесячный доход составляет около 20,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Санам обратилась в Банк «Бай–Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 150,000 сом (KGS) на покупку скота для откорма и перепродажи. Доходы от кредита Санам планирует вложить в дальнейшее расширение бизнеса, чтобы накопит средства на высшее образование ее детей.
texts.en: Sanam is 50 years old, is married and has three children. She has a secondary-specialized education. She works as a nurse. As an additional source of income for her family, she practices livestock breeding and crop farming. She started these businesses 14 years ago. Thanks to Sanam's hard work, she currently has 2 cows on her farm. Her average monthly income is 20,000 som (KGS). For the further development of her business, Sanam turned to Microfinance Bank "Bai Tushum." She is requesting a loan for 150,000 som (KGS) to buy cattle to fatten up and resell. Sanam plans to invest the earnings from the loan in the further development of her business so that she can save money for her children's higher education.

loans.use: to purchase additional cattle for fattening up and reselling.

loans.name: Clarita

texts.en:
Clarita is 61 years old and lives in La Union, La Libertad, ZDN.  She has experienced hardships, especially in raising her family. This industrious member finds herself plowing the corn field and planting potatoes. In need of additional working capital, Clarita joined Paglaum Cooperative. 

Clarita has received several loans and recently requested a loan for 12,000 PHP, which she will use to buy vegetable seedlings and three sacks of fertilizer. Being a MIGS member (Member in Good Standing) of the cooperative, she has been able to manage her income and provide for the daily needs of her family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and vegetable seedlings

loans.name: Moses' Group

texts.en:
Moses, featured in the above picture, is representing his farming group formed by seven farmers in Matete District, Kenya. He is 49 years old and a married father of five children, who is often described as a very hardworking individual. 

Although Moses has been a farmer for more than 20 years, he is new to One Acre Fund and decided to join this year because he really wanted to have access to quality training and acquire new farming methods. Even though he is new to the program, Moses wanted to represent his group because he wants to help more farmers. With the profits earned from this season’s harvest, Moses hopes to be able to send his children to school.

With this loan, the group will receive farming inputs to plant a total of 3 acres of land. They will also receive a total of 9 solar lights, as, even though Moses decided not to, some of the farmers in the group will be purchasing solar lights as part of their loan package.

loans.use: to purchase hybrid seeds and fertilizer for the cultivation of maize

loans.name: Gladys' Group

texts.en:
Gladys is 40 years old and has six children. She is a group leader and is representing her group, formed by ten farmers in Matete District, Kenya. 

Gladys has been farming with One Acre Fund for years now, having joined the program for the first time in 2011. This decision was largely a result of her desire to get the best quality fertilizer and hybrid seeds and, although she described her last harvest as good, she believes she could have a better one this year by continuing to work alongside One Acre Fund. Gladys also decided to purchase a solar light as part of her loan, which she is very excited about, since it will allow her to reduce the consumption of paraffin fuel and, therefore, save more money.

Obtaining this loan means that Gladys's Group will be able to receive a total of eight solar lights, as well as farming inputs to plant a total of 4.75 acres.

loans.use: to purchase a solar light and gain access to cost-efficient, hybrid seeds and fertilizer for maize cultivation.

loans.name: Pardahol

texts.ru:
Пардахол   жизнерадостная и трудолюбивая женщина. Ей 46 лет. Пардахол замужем и имеет 4-их детей. У Пардахол сред образования. Она живет со своей семьей в сельской местности.
Пардахол  занимается своим бизнесом. Она покупает на рынках скот,  ухаживает за ним некоторое время, а после продаёт скот. Получает Пардахол  от этого дела не плохой доход. 
Сейчас Пардахол  хочет увеличить количество скота и купить корм для них на зиму. Для этого она обратилась в Арванд за кредитом. Пардахол заранее благодарит за поддержку и надеется на положительный результат.
texts.en:
Pardahol is a cheerful and hardworking woman of 46. She is married and has four children. She has a high school education and lives with her family in a rural region. She runs her own business buying livestock at the market, raising them for some time, then reselling them. She receives a decent income from this work.

Pardahol currently wants to increase her quantity of livestock and to buy winter feed for them. For this she has turned to Arvand for a loan. She thanks you in advance for the support and hopes for a positive result.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Ana Ruth

texts.es:
Ana, de 27 años de edad, está compañada, es ama de casa, por la falta de recursos económicos solamente estudio hasta sexto grado, tiene tres hijos, que asisten a la escuela, su esposo se dedica a la agricultura y a la venta de pan.

Ana, se ha dedicado por muchos  años a los oficios del hogar, así mismo cuando se acompañó, su pareja le enseño como se cultiva y así fué como aprendió la agricultura.- Ahora, también se dedican a la venta de pan, se levanta muy temprano a realizar los oficios domésticos y luego a las 5:30 de la mañana se dispone ir a vender pan a las casas vecinas.

Su compañero de vida, también va a vender pan y lo hace en otra zona para generar mas ingresos, para poder cubrir las necesidades básicas de su hogar. 

El crédito será utilizado para comprar una motocicleta, para ir a vender pan a las comunidades vecinas, y así se le haga mas fácil transportarse a su pareja.

El sueño de Ana, es aumentar las ventas de pan, para generar más ingresos y poder darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Ana is 27 years old, is in a relationship, and is a homemaker. 

Because of the lack of financial means, she studied only up to sixth grade. She has three children, who go to school, and her life partner makes a living in farming and selling bread. 

Ana has been dedicated to household chores for many years. When she got into a relationship, her life partner taught her how to cultivate, and this is how she learned about farming. Now, she also sells bread. She gets up very early in the morning to do the household chores, and then, at 5:30 a.m., she goes out to sell bread in the neighbourhood. 

Her life partner also sells bread, and he goes to a different area in order to generate more income. In this way, they can meet the basic needs of their household.

The loan will be used to buy a motorcycle to go to the neighbouring communities to sell bread. In this way, it will be easier for her life partner to go from one place to another.

Ana's dream is to increase the bread sales in order to generate more income and, in this way, give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle to go to the neighbouring communities to sell bread.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy a high yielding  dairy cow

loans.name: Abdulotip

texts.ru: Абдулотип мужчина 55 лет , женат , отец пятерых детей и десяти внуков.
